item.title: Getting started with mainframe
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting mainframe set up or installed.

item.title: Links to IBM Mainframe Manuals on the Web
item.description: IBM z/OS Internet Library # http://ibm.com/systems/z/os/zos/library/bkserv/ System/360 (Early Publications: 1964 - ) # These PDF documents, starting from 1964, are those parts of the OS/360 “System Reference Library” (SRL) with enduring relevance and are also the earliest System/360 publications available on the web. Given IBM’s stubborn insistance on full upward compatibility, all facilities described here (most of which are still supported) continue to function as described, even on the most recent z/Architecture systems.
